channel.title: Comments on: Sometimes Select Is Broken
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Shaul
item.dc:creator: Shaul
item.description: Still your fault for not finding this bug earlier!
item.content:encoded: Still your fault for not finding this bug earlier!

item.title: By: Taipan
item.dc:creator: Taipan
item.description: Noooooooo...the users fault. Yep...The world would have been so perfectly convenient without them.
item.content:encoded:
Noooooooo…the users fault.
Yep…The world would have been so perfectly convenient without them.

item.title: By: Amit Schreiber
item.dc:creator: Amit Schreiber
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/old-blog/2974/comment-page-1#comment-187184">Taipan</a>.
:) As far as I recall, in your line of work "it's your data's fault" is more appropriate.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Taipan.

:) As far as I recall, in your line of work “it’s your data’s fault” is more appropriate.

item.title: By: Taipan
item.dc:creator: Taipan
item.description: Hehe... “It’s Always Your Fault”. That's a nice one. I probably have an appropriate opportunity to use it every day...in a mail to others :-) Well...This is the Israeli interpretation.
item.content:encoded:
Hehe… “It’s Always Your Fault”. That’s a nice one.
I probably have an appropriate opportunity to use it every day…in a mail to others :-)
Well…This is the Israeli interpretation.
